item.description:
No Limit Texas Hold 'Em Tournament at Mitch's in Hartford. Beginners are welcome. It's a $20 buy in with no rebuys or addons. Please bring a extra $1.00 to pass along to Nina for Meetup website fees as well. A couple of snacks and soda will be provided, but feel free to also bring along a snack. BYOB.  This is a ONE-table tournament so PLEASE:  If you RSVP and then find you can't attend, change your RSVP as soon as possible so someone can take your place.  If we have 8 players, the payouts will be either $90/$50/$20 or $100/$60, as decided by the players prior to the beginning of the game.

Blinds will go up every 20 minutes so we should have a winner before the late news.

Feel free to email me with any questions!  Looking forward to seeing you there!

If you've never played before, don't hesitate to come!  First, because the best (and really only) way to get comfortable with tournament poker is to DO IT!  Second, because we're a very friendly group and we'll be patient with you as you pick up the basics.  Third, because, as a beginner, experienced players will find you very unpredictable.  This makes you a viable threat, and you may even end up winning!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Light Green House with a big cement slab for a front yard.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold Em' at Mitch's
